amendment.description: To allow tribal members to make their own health care choices.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4034 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 28 - 67. Record Vote Number: 25.

action.text: Amendment SA 4034 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3899. (consideration: CR S996-1004, S1020-1022; text: CR H998) To allow tribal members to make their own health care choices.
